title: Can't go to ebay or amazon from the address bar any more.  How to fix that?
content:
Hi,

Type www.ebay.co.uk in address bar. I'm offered the chance to search Ebay but not to go to it. When I simply press return on the address nothing happens. Firefox doesn't go to ebay. Tried www.amazon.com, same result can't get firefox to go to either site unless I search for them on google and click a link.

These are popular sites for me. How can I just type in the site I want I get it to go there? And how come it's suddenly stopped allowing me to go directly to ebay & amazon?

Many thanks!

Evan
creator: evanmjones

title: White Screen Problem In Linux

Is the problem known?

title: FireFox Display is Jacked up.
content:
Out of now where today FireFox is not displaying pages correctly. There are white boxes around sections on pages which shouldn't be.

I have completely dumped all the profiles and cache, uninstalled, removed all traces of FireFox directories and reinstalled and am currently on 91.0.1 (64-bit) in Troubleshooting Mode and the issue still exists. Even the about:config page and white boxes around words on the msn website etc.

I have added images below as examples. Any help is appreciated to resolve. Thank you

title: Persistant caching  problem
content: My website was moved but Firefox won't accept the new address, substituting the old one instead, which of course leads nowhere. Chrome and Safari don't have this problem. This isn't the first such problem I've had with Firefox. I don't want to do a wholesale cache reset.

title: Firefox lag on new windows
content: My Firefox are lagging when i try to open a new windows on both normal and private browsing mode. It have a serious input lag when i try to type in the address bar and the search bar, about 1 to 2 second for the word show up. The problem is fixed when i am on the safe mode. So i went and refresh the Firefox and remove all the extension, the problem still persist. I also tried some other method suggested by other after my research, create a new account, turned off the hardware acceleration, set accessibility.force_disabled. None of them work, any clue on how can i fix this problem? The lag only happen on Firefox, i tried to typed on other software its fine, but i switch back to Firefox the input lag happen. Thanks and have a nice day!
creator: valentinezhen95

title: Cannot Import Bookmarks from Edge Browser
content: I installed Linux OS and now I am trying to get my bookmarks and passwords from my previous Firefox browser and Edge, but it is not syncing. I would be happy to have your opinions and solutions. Thank you!

title: Videos de Yotube se congelan por un momento pero el audio sigue.
content: Hola! Cuando estoy reproduciendo videos en YouTube me ocurre que el video se congela por un instante, pero el audio sigue, uego, el video retoma su reproducción y todo sigue como si nada hasta que sucede de nuevo. Es molesto y me ocurrió una vez ayer o antes de ayer, no recuerdo bien, pero lo solucioné borrando la caché y todo lo demás. El tema es que volvió a pasar ahora y, la verdad, se me ocurre que tiene que haber otra cosa que hacer. No me pasa con videos guardados en la PC o en otro navegador, copio el link del video y me voy a Edge y no pasa. Tengo una Dell 7567 con un i7 7700hq y una Nvidia Geforce 1050 ti. Tengo todo actualizado acorde al soporte de Dell. Saludos! Buen fin de semana. =D
creator: martbover

title: 10+ years of browser history gone
content: firefox browser history disappeared after deleting appdata temp folder. windows 10 pc using ccleaner i "cleaned" the ...\appdata\local\temp\ folder all browser history has disappeared is gone. i have 4 firefox profiles and even the 2 profiles that i have not used in more than 8 months have been wiped clean. unfortunately the appdata branch is not part of any of my backup routines. i had always thought that the FF profiles contained all the browser history and was rather shocked to see all my curated history was gone. fortunately i did not loose the extensive bookmarks. why would browser history be stored only in a temp folder? any ideas??
creator: cirom

title: icon missing after Skype Web FF Add-on installed
content:
Selected and installed the Skype Web FF Add-on to my installed Firefox version 91.0 for Linux Mint, 32-bit. However, after the installation was complete, there is not an icon showing or displayed in the menu bar to access, initiate and execute the Add-on. Thus, am unable to use this Add-on. Have also written an issue on the Add-on project page within GitLib which this Skype Web FF Add-on shows in their description and settings page within Firefox.

Anyone who knows how to get this Add-on icon to appear, display and give me access to execute is much appreciated.
creator: ntf3rd

title: recently updated to FF 91.0, and ever since i've had a pita issue with YouTube videos showing a black bar that cuts the video (horizontally) in half.  So essentially, the lower half of each and every YouTube video i try to watch has a black bar.
